flawed_nl_solution:
The rancher would have sold his cattle for $204000/340 = $<<204000/340=600>>600 per head.
He was left with a remainder of 340 - 172 = <<340-172=168>>168 head of cattle.
The lowered price is $600 - $150 = $<<600-150=450>>450 per head.
He would make $450 x 168 = $<<450*168=75600>>75600 at the lowered price.
He could have made $600 x 168 = $<<600*168=100080>>100080 at the original price.
He would lose $100080 - $75600 = $<<100080-75600=24480>>24480
#### 24480

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100800, not 100080. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
